content:
Foreign experts, the Minister of Defense of Rustem Umerov, as well as the International Team of the Ministry of Defense took part in the meeting.

This was reported in hisAppeal on April 1Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

“He held a special meeting today on our work with the Alliance on compatibility and prospects this year. He poses a few fundamental issues to NATO and NATO relations. In particular, this applies to the summit in Washington and many other aspects of interaction, ”said Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

The President recalled that only Ukraine in the Alliance can count on real security in Europe.

Asreported the armyinformToday, the President presented the Order of the Golden Star to the military, who was awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine.
title: President held a meeting on Ukraine's movement towards NATO
description: This was announced in his address on April 1 by Volodymyr Zelenskyy.    "I spent today...
author: Army Inform
